mapper.insert:
insert into order_detail (name, image, order_id, dish_id, setmeal_id, dish_flavor, amount) VALUES
(#{_.name}, #{_.image}, #{_.orderId}, #{_.dishId}, #{_.setmealId}, #{_.dishFlavor}, #{_.amount})
mapper.select: select od.name as name, sum(od.number) as number from orders left join order_detail od on orders.id = od.order_id where status = 5 and order_time >= #{beginTime} and order_time <= #{endTime} group by od.name order by number desc limit 0, 10
